response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its immense worth to you, I believe it could greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering this product to you for $1,200,000. This price reflects the balance between its intrinsic value and my desire to ensure you receive a fair deal. I trust that together we can make a transaction that meets both our expectations.", "product_price": 1200000}
